title: Redesign UI with new color scheme and icons

requirements.text: Update the color scheme to match the reference site at https://magical-sofa-cleaning-d8q.caffeine.xyz, replacing the current teal/cyan/blue water jet theme with the new color palette
acceptanceCriteria: All primary, secondary, and accent colors are updated throughout the application
Color variables in frontend/index.css and frontend/src/index.css are modified to reflect the new palette
Glassmorphism effects and gradients use the new color scheme
Button colors, backgrounds, and text colors are consistent with the new design

requirements.text: Replace all Font Awesome icons throughout the application with new icons that match the design style of the reference site

quotes: icon badhu aavi rite karva nu che

acceptanceCriteria: Icons in ServicesSection, CoverageSection, ServiceAreasSection, SofaCleaningSection, and WaterJetFoamSection are replaced
IconBadge component uses new icon assets or icon library
Navigation and footer icons are updated
All icons maintain consistent visual style and sizing

requirements.text: Update the overall layout and design structure to match the reference site's visual hierarchy and component arrangement
acceptanceCriteria: Section spacing, padding, and margins match the reference design
Typography hierarchy (font sizes, weights, line heights) is updated
Card layouts and component styling follow the reference site patterns
Responsive behavior matches the reference site across device sizes

requirements.text: Update gradient backgrounds, glassmorphism effects, and visual decorations to align with the reference site aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section background and overlays match reference styling
Glass panel effects are updated with new colors and opacity values
Floating decorative elements match the reference design
Hover states and animations are consistent with the new theme

constraints: Preserve all existing functionality including WhatsApp integration, booking form, and language switching
Do not modify backend/main.mo as no backend changes are needed
Maintain multilingual support for English, Hindi, and Gujarati
Keep the existing component structure and routing
Do not change immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Adding new features or sections beyond design updates
Changing the content or text of existing sections
Modifying the booking flow or WhatsApp integration logic
